Name: HipDropRock
Notes: A rock that can be destroyed with a Ground Pound attack. It can spawn some items after destroying it.

Obj_arg0.Name: Item Type
Obj_arg0.Description: The item to be spawned after destroying it.

Obj_arg1.Name: Number of Star Bits
Obj_arg1.Description: The amount of Star Bits to be dropped. Default is 6. Requires Obj_arg0 set to 1.

Obj_arg7.Name: Hide Remains?
Obj_arg7.Description: If set, the smaller rocks that remain after destroying it will be hidden.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated when it disappears after destroying it.

SW_B.Description: Gets activated immediately after destroying it.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.
